document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Review of exome sequencing data of the proband and her unaffected son for 40 known genes causing congenital nonsyndromic cataracts revealed two variants, namely c.139GAAAAA (p.Asp47Asn; D47N) in the li>GJA8 gene and c.2036CAAAAT in the li>FYCO1 gene to be potentially pathogenic.">
<sentence id="s2" text="The mutation c.139GAAAAA in the li>GJA8 gene detected in the present study was also previously reported in Caucasian and Chinese families but with different phenotypes, i.e. nuclear and nuclear pulverulent cataracts.">
